EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Global-FoundryView ({!Contact.Email})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings to our value customer!
A new Global-FoundryView account with the following login ID {!Contact.Email} has been requested for your use. To access Global-FoundryView View, please click on the link https://www.global-foundryview.com
You can use your current FoundryView password to login to the new portal.
If you need any additional assistance, you can contact your GLOBALFOUNDRIES representative or email us at global-foundryview_support@globalfoundries.com
Global-FoundryView beta release is ready for your usage! Global-FoundryView was designed based upon a collaborative engagement between GLOBALFOUNDRIES and our customers and partners. In the coming months, GLOBALFOUNDRIES will be migrating applets from FoundryView to Global-FoundryView. In order to minimize memorization of multiple logins and passwords,you can log onto the Global-FoundryView (https://www.global-foundryview.com) site and access new and old applets. Our goal will be to finalize the transformation by the first half of 2014. Since the portal is focused on you, our customer, your feedback is appreciated which we will request you to complete a short survey in time to come.
To help you get started, please click on each link:
Watch the Global-FoundryView preview video Login New User Registration Subscription Team Room Contacts Management (Portal Admin only) Accounts Details Update (Portal Admin only) Training materials (Generic) Global-FoundryView Beta Program web site
Finally, please take note that if you have an account to the old portal, FoundryView, you can log into FoundryView with your old username or your Global-FoundryView username (which is your email address),
The Global-FoundryView Team from GLOBALFOUNDRIES
